dkupert.cipher

Class SubstitutionCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkupert.cipher.MonoAlphabeticCipher
      • dkupert.cipher.SubstitutionCipher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cipher

    public class SubstitutionCipher
extends MonoAlphabeticCipher
    Uses the parent class MonoAlphabeticCipher to encrypt and decrypt text using the SubstitutionCipher

    2018-10-17
    Author:
    dkupert
